items.text: Food was very mediocre (mussels / fish and chips)
The mussels in the starter menu is more than enough to fill your tummy and you can re-fill your french fries for free. They also got amazing collection of beers.
Stick to mussells and fries because the rest of the menu is hopelessly bad.
Vic Blac Mussels/Clams is GREAT! Starter-size is just nice for 2. MUST TRY!

We remembered the place better. Ordered a starter size mussels in chilli crab sauce. The sauce was good (you can eat it on its own!) but the mussels are minuscule. Tak shiok. They forgot our soup too.
I always order the Grey Shrimp on Toast
Try the Boulettes - #meatballs
There was a slight lack of attention by the service staff.
Not a fan of the impatient service.
Great selection of beer and mussel options. Had a starter size mussels, which was enough when you add bread and chips (they aren't fries) - and I've got an appetite.
Can't go wrong with their mussels! Great beer food.
Some service staff are just crap. They should get a diff job if they don't like to wait tables.
Leffe brune !
Не плохой гэндель;))
I love the place very much! Big choice of belgian beers(Duvel for me) and the food is excellent. I had the duck and as desert creme brulee with rhubarb. Yummy.
Raspberry & cherry beers are very fragrant & refreshing!
Cross Brussels Sprouts off your "dog friendly" list of places. Sadly, that list is getting shorter and shorter in Singapore.
Can be very busy so order  all at once,  ask for the pilsner beer menu list
Leffe brune ftw. Happy hour til 8pm.
the aglio olio is heavenly jfc
The laksa mussels are crazy good! Comes with tau pok and prawns!
Belgiam fries!
Awesome mussels!!!! Personal favourite Tom yum & Chili crab;-) cherry beer oishiiiiii
Everyday 1for1.
I don't understand why a joint with free flow fries insist on serving sauces in tiny disposable saucers. Probably so you can keep their staff busy and grumpy with requests of refill.
One for one mussels after 11pm!
The waiters here only serves Caucasians. The rest are invisible to them.
Try the ostendaise sauce clams! Brings out the freshness of the clams
For the mussels, go for the local flavours. All-time faves are chilli crab and tom yam!
Lobster Bisque Mussels are awesome
Nice food good drink !!!
I went expecting to be disappointed, but actually the mussels are amazing - but a bit pricey. Fat chips rather than skinny frites, but they're free flow so that's forgiven!
The Tom Yam mussel is nice :) free flow fries with any order of mussels! Great variety of beer too! My personal fav is Chapeau lemon-salty,sour,lemony lambic beer.
Mussels are quite mediocre. Fries are good though
If you like belgian beer and mussels, this is the place.
Blue cheese mussels is must-try.
Rudest staff. Snide comments and completely unhelpful.
Any of the 50+ Belgian beers are a must, and the moul frittes with a clear broth will be simply wonderful.
The mussels used to be better but wash it all down with fruit beer, it's fine. Surprise find: the toasted bread is good, especially to sop up broths with.
The mussels cooked in white wine and celery are a safe bet
Mussels along with an impressive selection of 80 Belgian beers. Best part was Jack Magik who came to our table. Jack's there every sat night from 2230 and sun afternoons. Make your bookings early.
Les moules sont cheres !
My friend highly recommended. The combination of Belgian beer n mussels are great. Beer 1 for 1 till 7pm. Moules take away may be available.
Mussels are great! Tomato mozzarella salad is nice too. Great place too if you like beer, I think there's around 4-5 pages of beer selection.
Satan Gold is amazing
apparently the mussels are good but i thought they were "ok" #imo
Leffe blond. And moules frites
Nice food, nice beers, pity of the unfriendly service. Doesn't give a good impression of the belgian hospitality and our love for beers or food.
3rd time I'm stay here
I love the gratin d'endives - i don't see it on the menu anymore. Best moules mariniere & chips, & in 2016, the pink rosée Hoegaarden on tap. Same goes for the SQUE outlet by masterchef Stroobant.
They have a frites station. Free flow!
The $25 for two pots of mussels are fantastic! Only Monday to Thursday 5-7 pm and 10-12 pm.
Most excellent place for mussels and Belgian beer by the river. Crab cake is awesome too.
The l'escargot mussels are damn awesome.
Souvignon blanc Mount Raley is really good, chocolate fondants is DAMN good!!
Ash delivers the best service! Polite and always with a smile!
The mussels sauce with ham is most tasty. Happy hr ends at 8pm
Happy hour until 8pm
Best clams! Try it with cream A L'ardennaise! (:
There's no Brussels Sprouts on the menu at Brussels Sprouts.
Best mussels in Singapore!
My new number. Shoban/z
Great service from the staff. Although they lost our reservation, they went all out to try and get us enough seats for our big group. Thanks to one of the service staff, Ash.
เบียร์ leffe blonde ใช้ได้นะ
Cheers and Beers!!!
One of the best mussels
very good selection of belgian beers!
Happy Hour before 8pm
musselsss, yummy!
Poulette mussels + Leffe Brune = great combination! Oh, and the Steak frites and Pork belly glazed with red wine sauce are also good
Jcvd nowhere to be seen. Ah the othe mussels from brussels
25% off happy hours for house pours!!
Only eat here if zombies have feasted on your brains ... Or if u like Mayonnaise ... Dislike
Love the Lindermann draught apple there! It goes well with fries! Chilli crab mussels are definitely worth the try!
Look out for the magician who has the awesomest card tricks.
Great wine and beer selection! And the devilled mussels are the bomb. Not for the fainthearted tho!
Mussels, french fries and beer: what else? Family friendly too
Ask for salt.  Everything was aggressively under seasoned and somewhat bland.  Also, the main size muscles are in no way 750g. They are 450g at best unless you are weighing the onions and stock.
The portebello mushrooms and salmon shrimp salad were good!
Nice leffe and beef cheeks
$25 for 2 buckets of mussels.
Mussel and hoe garden and a great place for brunch.
Very nice mussels, especially recommend the marinieres. And don't miss out on grey shrimp!
Service not bad. Range of food wide and quality pretty decent.
Mussels, ribs and burgers are good. Chicken wings no and beer is warm
The cod fish with butter sauce is really good!
From 8 to 14 August, chef Michael di Placido puts a local spin on his classic Belgian ingredients. Try the Mussels Bak Kut Teh and Wanton Revisited.
All about beers and clams in Belgian style. Really love it. And great scenery.
Oh...I forgot to mention... service is super! All nice and helpful people.
Kudos to the belgian beer (y)
